/usr/bin/cc CMakeFiles/ffmpeg-player.dir/main_thread.c.o -o ffmpeg-player   -L/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/ffmpeg-player  -L/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/PUBLIC  -L/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/3rdparty/ffmpeg-4.4.1/lib  -L/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/3rdparty/sdl2/lib  -L/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/3rdparty/libx264/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/ffmpeg-player:/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/PUBLIC:/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/3rdparty/ffmpeg-4.4.1/lib:/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/3rdparty/sdl2/lib:/home/eric/Projects/Decode/ffmpeg-play/ffmpeg-sdl2-hwaccel/3rdparty/libx264/lib: -lavutil -lavformat -lavcodec -lavdevice -lswscale -lswresample -lSDL2 -lx264
